original_title: S. Thomas’ bowled out for 165 in Mustangs Trophy
original_body_lines: S. Thomas' College were bowled out for 165 in the 46th Mustangs Trophy encounter against Royal College, being played at the SSC grounds today.
Sanadhi Bulankulame top scored for the Thomians with 66 off 133 deliveries, with only three other batters scoring in double digits.
The Thomians recovered for a poor start at 26 for 3, before the fourth wicket partnership of 41 between Bulankulame and Mahith Perera was broken by Ranuka Malaviarachchi with the score on 67.
The last four batsmen were dismissed for the addition of 17 runs.
S. Thomas' 165 in 48.2 overs (Senadhi Bulankulame 66, Mahith Perera 28, Bulan Weeratunga 2/24, Sandesh Ramanayake 2/34, Dasis Manchanayake 2/25)
